title: Brave New World
description: "Aldous Huxley's mighty novel of a soulless, streamlined Eden is the twentieth century's most brilliant, profound and terrifying evocation of the future our civilization may be creating. BRAVE NEW WORLD is Huxley's prophetic vision of natural man in an unnatural world, where freedom lies dead and all our concepts of morality are forgotten - an open-eyed, shocking look at a frighteningly possible tomorrow."
author: Aldous Huxley
